channel.title: ~*~ Open Coders Thread ~*~
channel.description:
[center][i]Since this thread was deleted, and I know Soule and know he won't mind, I decided to re post the open coders thread. Also, Soule didn't edit the post, but I will...[/i]
[u]This is Server Dev. Help, coding for people, so this can't be locked.[/u]
[size=16pt][b]~*~ Open Coders Thread ~*~[/b][/size]
[b]This thread is used to post if you're an open coder, willing to code for someone, but don't want to have to post a thread![/b]
[b][u]Open Coders List[/u][/b] 1. [b]Newb 2341[/b] 2. [b][/b] 3. [b][/b] 4. [b][/b] 5. [b][/b] 6. [b][/b] 7. [b][/b] 8. [b][/b] 9. [b][/b] 10. [b][/b]
[b]To apply to get on this list, use this format:[/b]
[code] [b]UserName:[/b] [b]Coding EXP:[/b] [b]Links To TUTs and/or Server Threads:[/b] [b]Hours You Can Code In A Day:[/b] [b]Why You Want To Code:[/b][/code]
[b]After you see a coder you like, please use this format to "claim" them, then I will strike their name out, and they will be yours after I PM them to get a YES or NO answer.[/b]
[code] [b]UserName Of Coder Wanted:[/b] [b]Number Of Coder (on list):[/b] [b]Name Of Your Server:[/b] [b]How Much You Want Done (mark --- if code the server):[/b] [b]Rewards:[/b][/code]
[b]Have fun and apply![/b][/center]

item.title: ~*~ Open Coders Thread ~*~
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

[center]Since this thread was deleted, and I know Soule and know he won’t mind, I decided to re post the open coders thread. Also, Soule didn’t edit the post, but I will…

This is Server Dev. Help, coding for people, so this can’t be locked.

[size=16pt]~~ Open Coders Thread ~~[/size]

This thread is used to post if you’re an open coder, willing to code for someone, but don’t want to have to post a thread!

Open Coders List

  1. Newb 2341

To apply to get on this list, use this format:

[b]UserName:[/b] [b]Coding EXP:[/b] [b]Links To TUTs and/or Server Threads:[/b] [b]Hours You Can Code In A Day:[/b] [b]Why You Want To Code:[/b]

After you see a coder you like, please use this format to “claim” them, then I will strike their name out, and they will be yours after I PM them to get a YES or NO answer.

[b]UserName Of Coder Wanted:[/b] [b]Number Of Coder (on list):[/b] [b]Name Of Your Server:[/b] [b]How Much You Want Done (mark --- if code the server):[/b] [b]Rewards:[/b]

Have fun and apply![/center]

Read full topic
